CatDescriptText: Mrs. Rose Miller, 2312 Fifth Avenue, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 13, 1958, pg. 2 with question: �What do you think of young men or boys who process their hair? Do you think it improves their appearance or not?� answer reads: �I don�t like it, although I have a grandson who does.�
TitMainTitle: Rose Miller, wearing button down striped dress with short sleeves and collar, holding dark handbag, standing on sidewalk in front of large rectangular stone wall with reporter wearing patterned bow tie, writing in notebook
